title: Fighter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, if you are not Ignited, visit a player. If you see any Triggers, you will Ignite.
- At night, if you are Ignited, rampage at a player's house.

fields.name: Triggers:
fields.value:
- Being attacked or visiting a player who is attacked
- Visiting an evil player
- Visiting a kill-capable player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with four random targets who are Threats. Only 1 maximum can be from an evil faction, if any.
- You know the roles of Threats, but not their names.
- You stop being Ignited once every Threat is dead.
-  - **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**
- If part of the Daily Streak faction, loses its Destiny and instead wins with Daily Streaks. Additionally, you will not trigger when visiting an evil player. None of your targets will be from an evil faction. Ignition fades away after killing a Threat.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live to the end of the game without any threats.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny

desc:
Post 4653
*"A thundering BAM made the world go silent except for the ringing in my ears, and a flash of light and a blur of metal rang through the door, and all hell broke loose as the memories flooded back. I heard voices shouting from all directions, commands to fire and where, and the sound of distant artillery guns blasting. Suddenly I could smell sulfur and burnt plastic and gunfire and sewage. I was no longer shivering in the cold, my body was burning up in the heat and the flames took control of my muscles like a puppeteer and ordered me to fight."*
